couponTitle: Take $50 Off w/ Promo Code
couponDescription: Enjoy a $50 discount on orders of $200 or more, save a $100 on orders of $400 or more and get a $250 discount on orders of $1000 or more. Paste this promo code at checkout.

couponTitle: Get $50 Off $200+ Orders With Neimanmarcus Code
couponDescription: Save $50 off on orders of $200 or more when using this NeimanMarcus promo code.

couponTitle: Take $300 Off
couponDescription: Earn up to a $300 gift card when you purchase using this coupon code on your cart at Neiman Marcus.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: Up to $300 Gift Card on Eligible Spend
couponDescription: Get ready to shop till you drop at NeimanMarcus.com. With this fabulous coupon code, you can earn up to a $300 gift card with your eligible purchases. Your favorite beauty and fragrance items are included in this deal. Hurry, this special offer is valid from 12/11 to 12/14 only.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: Get a Tiered Gift Card with $500+ Jewelry Purchase
couponDescription: Score a fantastic deal at NeimanMarcus.com, where you get a tiered gift card with your jewelry purchase of $500 or more, including fabulous pieces from Jay Strongwater and Judith Leiber. Just remember to punch in the coupon code at checkout. This dazzling offer is only valid from November 8th through 18th. Happy luxury shopping.

couponTitle: Get $250 Off On $1,000+ Purchases At Neiman Marcus
couponDescription: Take up to $250 off when you spend $1,000 at Neiman Marcus.

couponTitle: Buy 1, Get 1 Free On Your Order
couponDescription: Buy one, get one free on 17 items and teint idole foundation with this Neiman Marcus code.

couponTitle: 10% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Apply this coupon code from Neiman Marcus to receive a 10% discount on your order.
Take $50 off your order of $200 or more when you apply this NeimanMarcus promo code at checkout.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Promo Code: 10% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Receive 10% off for March birthdays on your sitewide order with Neiman Marcus' promo code. Redeem at checkout.

couponTitle: Get Free 2-Day Shipping On Your Order
couponDescription: Enjoy free 2-day shipping with this Neiman Marcus code.

couponTitle: Take $500 Off using Coupon Code
couponDescription: Enjoy up to $500 off when you spend $2,000 includes beauty and fragrance. Use this NeimanMarcus promo code at checkout.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: $300 Off When You Order $1,200+
couponDescription: Score a fabulous deal at NeimanMarcus.com. With this coupon code, you can snag an amazing $300 off when you spend $1,200 or more. What a fantastic way to grab some stylish goodies while saving big.

couponTitle: Take $275 Off w/ Discount Code
couponDescription: Enter this promo code at checkout to enjoy up to $275 off select regular-price items.

couponTitle: Save 15% Off w/ Discount Code
couponDescription: Save 15% off on $300 orders, 20% off on $500 orders or 25% off on $1000 orders at neimanmarcus.

couponTitle: Double Gift Card
couponDescription: Double your gift card order when using this NeimanMarcus promo code.

couponTitle: Receive Complimentary Gift With $500+ Purchases
couponDescription: Free Promotional Gift on orders of $500 or more

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: Earn a $35 - $700 Gift Card with Your Purchase
couponDescription: Get ready to shop till you drop. Use the discount code at NeimanMarcus.com and stand a chance to win a gift card ranging from $35 to $700. Unfortunately, beauty and fragrance items are excluded. But hurry - this fantastic offer is only valid from 1/29 to 1/31. Don't miss this golden opportunity.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: 15% Off Your Order
couponDescription: Get 15% off sitewide by using this Neiman Marcus code.

couponTitle: Neiman Marcus Coupon: Guaranteed Delivery by 12/24 and Free Shipping on Orders $50+
couponDescription: Neiman Marcus is currently offering an incredible holiday shipping special. Ensure your gifts arrive in time for Christmas by placing your orders between the 13th and 21st of December. Plus, enjoy free shipping on all orders over $50 when you use this coupon code at checkout.
